get.summary: View card tokenization report, groupped in specified way

tokens_used_8.description: How many tokens were used 8 times during period

tokens_used_9.description: How many tokens were used 9 times during period

tokens_used_10_and_more.description: How many tokens were used 10 and more times during period

get.summary: View list of clearing operations. Needs permission svxp:list
QMR - get list of transaction. Needs permission svxp:list

post.summary: Recieve new access token using refresh token
